data.title: The Currency of Tibet by Wolfgang Bertsch: pbk (2002)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9788186470329 - pbk - Library of Tibetan Works and Archives - 2002 - This is a sourcebook for the study of Tibetan coins paper money and other forms of currency There is a comprehensive introduction with illustrations of paper currency and coins and their explanations 168 pp. - The Currency of Tibet

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs includes insurance. Books lost in transit will be replaced immediately. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know if extra shipping is required.
